content: Hey folks, we recently implemented a feature to glacier but it requires the bot (@rust-lang-glacier-bot) to have the push access on the repo (see "labels" parameter description on https://docs.github.com/en/rest/reference/issues#create-an-issue). It'd be great if someone could grant it, thanks!
Hm, doesn't the bot run in CI on that repository? the GITHUB_TOKEN in the GHA environment should already have write access, and is generally preferable
Ah, that makes sense. The bot currently uses a token that has the write access only on rust-lang/rust but yeah, secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN should work well in this case. Thanks!
